rules_text:
Whenever a player develops Evacuation of Elbryn, each player who developed it may exile another permanent they control until Evacuation of Elbryn leaves the battlefield.
When Evacuation of Elbryn has six development counters on it, destroy all permanents.
Develop 3–{3} [i]({3}: Note your name and put a development counter on this. Any player may develop this as a sorcery if there are fewer than three counters on this.)[/i]
